flawed_nl_solution:
Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=1.2>>1.2 inches per year.
To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=20>>20 inches.
It will take her a total of 20 / 1.2 = <<20/1.2=16.67>>16.67 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 16.67 = <<12+16.67=28.67>>28.67 years old when she achieves the world record.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
